Text.Language: Hiten nip~recbia: n~te ]yeo~tokoc eyouab Maria: P[oic a~rih~mot nan: m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the intercessions, of the Theotokos Saint Mary, O Lord grant us, the forgiveness of our sins.
